hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select usertype as type from zbox.UserBoxRel where boxid = :BoxId and userid = :UserId
hibernate-mapping.query:
select
COALESCE(u.FirstName,u.Name) as FirstName, u.MiddleName as MiddleName, u.LastName as LastName,
u.ImageLarge as Image, coalesce( v.OrgName , v.UniversityName) as University, v.LargeImage as UniversityPic, u.Email as Email, u.Culture as Language, u.Quota.AllocatedSize as AllocatedSize, u.Quota.UsedSpace as UsedSpace from User u left join u.University v where u.Id = :UserId
